sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by mharty

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Was not that a meadow hen which I scared up in 2 places by the river side- of a dark brown like a small woodcock- though it flew straight & low. I go along the flat Hosmer shore to Clamshell Hill- Thg sparganium seed balls beg. to brown & come off in the hand- The Ammannia humilis is quite abundant on the denuded shore there- & in John Hosmers meadow –now turned red. & in John Hosmers meadow –now turned red. & so detected –reddening the ground.”
"XVII / 13 February-3 September 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:23 / PE 8, p.309 vol.8; Torrey JVI & JVII, p.#"
